prompt_used: Professional process flow diagram on pure black background (#000000) showing sequential skill execution in AI agent system. TOP TO BOTTOM FLOW with 6 stages, connected by white arrows (3px, 80% opacity). STAGE 1: User Input 'morning briefing'. STAGE 2: MAC MASTER AGENT (orange #C15F3C) receives & routes command. STAGE 3: Three parallel skills (email-summary red, slack-catchup purple, calendar-briefing blue). STAGE 4: Three MCP boxes (Gmail red, Slack purple, Calendar blue). STAGE 5: Three system boxes (Gmail Inbox, Slack Workspaces, Google Calendar). STAGE 6: SUMMARIES RETURNED TO USER (green #34A853). Numbered sequence indicators 1-6 in orange circles. Clean flow diagram, clear vertical hierarchy, crisp typography, high contrast.

aesthetic_requirements.typography: SF Pro family, crisp and readable

content_structure.sequence_indicators: Numbers 1-6 in orange circles (#C15F3C) with white borders

usage_context.purpose: Shows complete 6-stage workflow from user input through agent execution to results

quality_assessment.clarity: 10/10 - All 6 stages clearly labeled and readable
quality_assessment.notes: MUCH better than video attempt - static diagram with text labels was the right approach

notes: Static diagram successfully shows complete workflow with numbered stages and clear text labels. This is the correct approach - video generators cannot reliably create diagrams with precise typography. Hold this static frame for 60 seconds in video editor.
